    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mobile Finisher](/Feats.aspx?ID=6170) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Finisher" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=802" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 168 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You attack in motion. Stride and then Strike. You can use Mobile Finisher while [Burrowing](/Actions.aspx?ID=2310), [Climbing](/Actions.aspx?ID=2374), [Flying](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312), or [Swimming](/Actions.aspx?ID=2381) instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.
name: Mobile Finisher
